page.title: 34EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Levels of unemployment are low in the area compared to other places. The majority of people who work do so away from the village. Opportunities to work within the village are limited, as there are only a small number of businesses employing small numbers of people. Farming is still a major part of the area but does not employ large amounts of people. There are also a number of people who work from home or who run their business from their home, but this represents only a minority of the working population.
